<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a> (9)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=58" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>See <a href="Translingual">Translingual section</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=61" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>The Russian name for <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b> (<i>a</i>) is <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b> (<i>ฤ</i>), and in stressed syllables it has the sound of the long <b>a</b> in <i>f<b>a</b>ther</i>. In unstressed positions, it is pronounced as a schwa, like the <b>o</b> in <i>m<b>o</b>ther</i>. (Unstressed Russian <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b> (<i>a</i>) is pronounced the same as unstressed Russian <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพ.html>ะพ</a></b> (<i>o</i>).)
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=62" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*a</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro">*ล</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%81%C5%8Ddamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/hโลd (page does not exist)">*hโลd</a></i> (presumed to be the ablative of <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*รฉy, hโe</i>). Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language">Lithuanian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">รต</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p><p>Possible link with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language">Lithuanian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">arฬ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">question particle</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Russian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Russian language">Russian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">i</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐ.html>ะดะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">da</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language">Lithuanian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">arฬ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">if, whether</span><span annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">and</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren </p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_8">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=64" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">a</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>but, and (introduces a new or different meaning).
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะณะพะดะฝั.html>ะกะตะณะพฬะดะฝั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะฟะปัะน.html>ัะตะฟะปะพฬ</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒัะตัะฐ.html>ะฒัะตัะฐฬ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑััั.html>ะฑัฬะปะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะปะพะดะฝัะน.html>ัะพฬะปะพะดะฝะพ</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Sevรณdnja teplรณ, <b>a</b> vฤerรก bรฝlo xรณlodno.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">It is warm today, <b>but</b> yesterday it was cold.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ััะพ.html>ะญฬัะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฑะปะพะบะพ.html>ัฬะฑะปะพะบะพ</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณัััะฐ.html>ะณััฬัะฐ</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">รto ne jรกbloko, <b>a</b> grรบลกa.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">This is not an apple, <b>but</b> a pear.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะพ.html>ััะพ</a>?</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>A</b> ลกto?</i> โ <span class="e-translation">Why so?</span></div></dd>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_2">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=67" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_4">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=70" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_2">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=72" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Abbreviation of | <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฐะผะฟะตั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ampรฉr</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=74" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">a</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>indeclinable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>A, amp, ampere</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_2">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=75" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=77" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">a</span>) (<i>invariable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">criminal slang</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> he, she or it (used to point to a particular person)</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะดะฝะธะน.html>ััะตฬะดะฝะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, ะฝะตัะบะปะพะฝัะตะผะพะต | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 0  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B6%D1%83%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=20" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะฑะฐะถัฬั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abaลพรบr</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะฑะฐะถัฬัะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะฑะฐะถัฬัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะฑะฐะถัฬัะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>lampshade</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">dated</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> a visor, worn on the forehead to protect one's eyes from the sun</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">slang</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> head</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">slang<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | humorous</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> order, norm <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">pun on <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะถัฬั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aลพรบr</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตัั.html>ะัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒ.html>ะฒ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฐะถัั.html>ะฐะฑะฐะถัฬัะต</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Vsjรณ v <b>abaลพรบre</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">Everything's in order</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะฐ.html>ะฑะฐฬ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะถัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑะฐะถัั-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>ัะฐััะธัะฝ.: <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะปะฐัะพะฝ.html>ะฟะปะฐัะพฬะฝ</a></li></ol>
</body>***ะฐะฑะฑัะตะฒะธะฐัััะฐ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะฑัะตะฒะธะฐัััะฐ.html>ะฐะฑะฑัะตะฒะธะฐััฬัะฐ</a> (26425)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>An 18th century borrowing from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Italian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Italian language">Italian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="it">abbreviatura</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Late_Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Late Latin">Late Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">abbrevio</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">I shorten</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตัะฐ.html>ะฒะตฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตัะฐ.html>ะฒะตฬั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฒะตั-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">grammar</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> paragraph
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตะปะฐัั.html>ะดะตฬะปะฐัั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะทะฐั.html>ะฐะฑะทะฐฬั</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">dรฉlatสน <b>abzรกc</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">to make a paragraph</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">ะฝะฐัะฐัั/ะฝะฐัะธะฝะฐัั <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะพะฒัะน.html>ะฝะพฬะฒะพะณะพ</a>) <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะทะฐั.html>ะฐะฑะทะฐฬัะฐ</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">naฤรกtสน/naฤinรกtสน s (nรณvovo) <b>abzรกca</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">to begin a (new) line/paragraph; to indent a line</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">informal</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> an indentation at the start of a paragraph.
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตะปะฐัั.html>ะดะตฬะปะฐัั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะทะฐั.html>ะฐะฑะทะฐฬั</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">dรฉlatสน <b>abzรกc</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">to indent</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">euphemism</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> for <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฟะธะทะดะตั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pizdรฉc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">paragraph</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะฐัะฐะณัะฐั.html>ะฟะฐัะฐฬะณัะฐั</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">parรกgraf</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (see usage notes)</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">indentation</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะพััััะฟ</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">รณtstup</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑะทะฐัะฝัะน (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑะทะฐัะฝัะน</a> ะพััััะฟ</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abzรกcnyj รณtstup</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะบัะฐฬัะฝะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะพะบะฐ.html>ัััะพะบะฐฬ</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krรกsnaja strokรก</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">euphemism for ะฟะธะทะดะตั</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฟะธะฟะตั</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pipรฉc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะธัะตั.html>ะฟะธัะตฬั</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pisรฉc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะบะฐะฟะตั (page does not exist)">ะบะฐะฟะตั</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kapรฉc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะทะฐั.html>ะะฑะทะฐฬั</a></b> translates as paragraph and is marked by an indentation and by the typographical character ยถ. Conversely, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะฐัะฐะณัะฐั.html>ะฟะฐัะฐฬะณัะฐั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">parรกgraf</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> translates as section, is demarked by a <a href="/w/index.php?title=section_breakamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="section break (page does not exist)">section break</a>, and by the symbol ยง. Compare also <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">razdรฉl</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะทะฐั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 5a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะทะฐั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะตะถะดะพะผะตัะธะต.html>ะะตะถะดะพะผะตฬัะธะต</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑะทะฐั-</b>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตฬะฝั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abiturijรฉnt, abituriรฉnt</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตฬะฝัะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตฬะฝัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตฬะฝัะพะฒ</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝัะบะฐ</b>, <i>related adjective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝัะฝัะน</b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฐะฑะธัััะธะตะฝััะบะธะน</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>graduate, school-leaver</li>
<li>university applicant, enrollee, candidate for a university entrance examination. <span class="defdate">[from mid 20 c.]</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตฬะฝั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abonemรฉnt</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตฬะฝัะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตฬะฝัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตะฝั.html>ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตฬะฝัะพะฒ</a></b>, <i>related adjective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฐะฑะพะฝะตะผะตะฝัะฝัะน</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>subscription, season ticket</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะฑะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะตะฝั.html>ะผะตะฝั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑะพะฝ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href="/w/index.php?title=-%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="-ะตะผะตะฝั (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะฐะฝะธัะฐ.html>ัััะฐะฝะธฬัะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ัััะตััะฒัฬะตั</a>)">-ะตะผะตะฝั</a></b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะดะฟะธัะบะฐ.html>ะฟะพะดะฟะธฬัะบะฐ</a></li>

<ol><li>abortion</li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะฐ</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะพัั.html>ะฑะพัั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%B2amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะทะธะฒ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%B2amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">abracadabra</i>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐะฑัะฐ.html>ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐฬะฑัะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abrakadรกbra</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐะฑัะฐ.html>ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐฬะฑัั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐะฑัะฐ.html>ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐฬะฑัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐะฑัะฐ.html>ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐฬะฑั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>nonsense, gibberish</li>
<li>abracadabra</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะบะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐ.html>ะดะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑัะฐ.html>ะฑัะฐ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 1-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะฐะบะฐะดะฐะฑั-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะตะบ.html>ะฐะฑัะตฬะบ</a> (16294)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Ossetian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ossetian language">Ossetian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="os"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D3%95%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัำะณ (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัำะณ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Os-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">abrรฆg</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">robber</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Armenian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Armenian language">Armenian</a></span> <i class="Armn mention" lang="hy">ีกีพีกีฆีกีฏ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Hy-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">avazak</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">robber</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะตะบ.html>ะฐะฑัะตฬะบ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abrษk</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะตะบ.html>ะฐะฑัะตฬะบะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะตะบ.html>ะฐะฑัะตฬะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะตะบ.html>ะฐะฑัะตฬะบะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Abrek" class="extiw" title="w:Abrek">Abrek</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">offensive<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | ethnic slur</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> a native of the Caucasus</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะบะฐ.html>ัะตะบ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะตะบ-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะฐ.html>ะบะพั</a></b>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%81amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%81amp;action=editamp;section=17" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะฐ.html>ะบะพั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะธะบะพั-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพ.html>ะบะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพ.html>ัะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒัั.html>ะฒัฬะน</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะธะบะพั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะพะฒ</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัะน</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</body>***ะฐะฑัะพะปัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปัั.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬั</a> (22772)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">absolutus</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=10" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปัั.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">absoljรบt</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปัั.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬัะฐ</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะธะดะตะฐะป.html>ะธะดะตะฐฬะป</a>, ะปะพะณะพั, ะฟะตัะฒะพะพัะฝะพะฒะฐ, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝััะฒะพ.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝััะฒะพ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพัะตั.html>ัะฒะพัะตฬั</a>, ะทะฐะฒะตัััะฝะฝะพััั, ััะพะฟัะพัะตะฝัะฝะพััั, ะฑะตะทััะปะพะฒะฝะพััั</li>

</body>***ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝะพ.html

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝะพ.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬัะฝะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">absoljรบtno</span>)

<ol><li>absolutely</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective_2">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝะพ.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬัะฝะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">absoljรบtno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">short neuter singular of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝัะน.html>ะฐะฑัะพะปัฬัะฝัะน</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">absoljรบtnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพ.html>ัะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะปัััะน.html>ะปัฬั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะพ.html>ะฝะพ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>, ะพะฟัะตะดะตะปะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะตัะฐ.html>ะผะตฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะฟะตะฝั.html>ััะตฬะฟะตะฝะธ</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต. <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะฐะฒะฝะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะกัะฐะฒะฝะธฬัะตะปัะฝะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะฟะตะฝั.html>ััะตฬะฟะตะฝั</a> โ ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝะตะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะพะปัั-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะฝ-ะพ</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพ.html>ัะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะปัััะน.html>ะปัฬั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะปะฐะณะฐัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะัะธะปะฐะณะฐฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฐัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะบะฐฬัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ 1*a. <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะฐะฒะฝะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะกัะฐะฒะฝะธฬัะตะปัะฝะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะฟะตะฝั.html>ััะตฬะฟะตะฝั</a> | โ <i>ะฐะฑัะพะปััะฝะตะต.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัะพะปัั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพััะดะพัะฝัะน.html>-ะฝ</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัะน</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B1%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะพัะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a></b>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B1%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝัะน.html>ะฐะฑัััะฐฬะบัะฝัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abstrรกktnyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะต (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะต (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะต</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะน (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะน (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะน</a></b>, <i>superlative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะนัะธะน (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะฐะบัะฝะตะนัะธะน</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัััะฐะบั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>

<ol><li>absurdity</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัััะด</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัััะด-</b>.

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑัััะดะฝัะน.html>ะฐะฑััฬัะดะฝัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">absรบrdnyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะต (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะต (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะต</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะน (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะน (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะน</a></b>, <i>superlative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะนัะธะน (page does not exist)">ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะนัะธะน</a></b>)

<ol><li>absurd</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b>ะฐะฑ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัััะด<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะปะฐะณะฐัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะัะธะปะฐะณะฐฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฐัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะบะฐฬัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ 1*a. <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะฐะฒะฝะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะกัะฐะฒะฝะธฬัะตะปัะฝะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะฟะตะฝั.html>ััะตฬะฟะตะฝั</a> | โ <i>ะฐะฑัััะดะฝะตะต.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฐะฑัััะด-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพััะดะพัะฝัะน.html>-ะฝ</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัะน</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span></h4>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑััะตัั.html>ะฐะฑััะตฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abscรฉss</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑััะตัั.html>ะฐะฑััะตฬััะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑััะตัั.html>ะฐะฑััะตฬััั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐะฑััะตัั.html>ะฐะฑััะตฬััะพะฒ</a></b>)

<ol><li>abscess</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%86%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%81amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>ะฐะฑั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะตัั</b>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%81%D1%86%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%81amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฝะพะนะฝะธะบ.html>ะณะฝะพะนะฝะธฬะบ</a></li>
